Trade/Device Name(s): AG-695 Single Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AG-695 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AG-696 Single Blood Glucose Monitoring System
AG-696 Multi Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Andon AG-695 and AG-696 blood glucose monitoring systems for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using electrochemical biosensor technology
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip for monitoring diabetes control; single systems intended for personal use, multi systems for professional use in healthcare settings; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
